complianceText:
The output does not comply with the chatbot description because it contains multiple part-of-speech tags for each word, whereas the description requires only one tag per word. Additionally, some of the tags are used incorrectly, such as using CC and DT for the same word, or including phrases like "Adverb" instead of just the tag "RB". The output also includes a term "SB: Subordinating conjunction", which is not in the list of allowed part-of-speech tags provided in the description. Furthermore, the last line "[No tags.
